metadata.title: 5192-1 -- Apache Log4j 2 vulnerability
metadata.description: Chen Zhaojun discovered that Apache Log4j 2 allows remote attackers to run programs via a special crafted input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code. Please see the following link for more information: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/KnowledgeBase/Log4Shell
